short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically appends 'order=priceAsc' to URLs except the excluded ones.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically appends 'order=priceAsc' to URLs except the excluded ones. This allows people to see items starting from the lowest price by default like the good old times when the setting you chose, was remembered.
